about1: Student and lover of development since I was 17, I specialized in TypeScript during that time.
about2: Graduated in Computer Science from UNIPAC, I had the opportunity to participate in extracurricular projects that shaped my knowledge and my passion for software development and architecture.
about3: I currently work as a Fullstack Developer. In addition, I am also very active in the Angular community.
about4: My main stack has always been C# in backend and TypeScript in frontend using both Angular and React as frameworks. About databases, I have experience with MySQL and SQL Server as well as non-relational databases like MongoDB. With agile software development, I got my first certification in Scrum. In addition to development, I have also studied infrastructure in Cloud environments with Amazon Web Services (AWS).
